title: Sprint Nextel Receives NSA Surveillance Technology Integration Contract
description: NSA awards Sprint Nextel a significant contract for surveillance technology integration services, including mobile communications monitoring capabilities and network infrastructure modifications. The contract demonstrates the expansion of surveillance partnerships across all major telecommunications providers.
significance: Completes the surveillance infrastructure coverage across all major US telecommunications companies, ensuring comprehensive domestic communications monitoring capabilities.
summary: NSA awards Sprint Nextel a significant contract for surveillance technology integration services, including mobile communications monitoring capabilities and network infrastructure modifications. The contract demonstrates the expansion of surveillance partnerships across all major telecommunications providers.
